content:
FabricClientSettings.PartitionLocationCacheLimit Property

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

In this Article

Gets the maximum number of cached location entries on the client.

public long PartitionLocationCacheLimit { get; set; }
Returns
Int64

The maximum number of cached location entries on the client.

Remarks

The default value of the property is 1000.The property is not updatable. Setting this property will throw a exception.When the cache limit is reached the oldest entries are discarded first. The default value is 100.
